author: wn.com
title: Two new members join ESM Board of Auditors (ESM - European Stability Mechanism)
text: ( Source : ESM - European Stability Mechanism ) Luxembourg - The European Stability Mechanism (ESM) today welcomes two new members to its Board of Auditors. They are Andrew Harkness, Secretary and Director of Audit at Ireland 's Office of the
